experiences.title: Co-Founder & CEO
experiences.description: AnFin is a venture-backed fintech company building the most innovative products in the wealth management and brokerage space. We strongly believe in the power of the stock market to transform developing economies. Therefore, we want to democratize access to stocks, bonds, and structured investment products. By leveraging scalable technology and strategic partnerships, AnFin plans to build an ecosystem of products that connect stakeholders in a seamless way.

experiences.title: Co-founder & CEO
experiences.description: VRED is a large sales-agent-platform with 500,000+ registered agents throughout 63 provinces of Vietnam. It works with corporate clients such as banks, finance companies, insurance companies, brands, and e-commerce companies to innovatively distribute their goods and services to provincial areas effectively at lower cost. VRED platform enabled micro-entrepreneurs in provincial areas to earn additional income and improve their lives. Through VRED distribution network, VRED creates easy access to high quality goods and services at competitive price, especially financial products, in many Vietnamese communities

experiences.title: Co Founder
experiences.description: Ahamove is one of the largest on-demand delivery platforms in Vietnam. Ahamove platform connects suppliers and merchants, capitalizing on excess capacity in the economy to create value for suppliers and help merchants grow their business

experiences.title: Project Head - Giám Đốc Dự Án
Online Research Manager - comScore Sales Manager
experiences.description:
•	Worked with Publishers, Agencies and Brands to develop market strategy and lead sales effort for comScore products in Vietnam.
•	Conducted training sessions for clients on how to optimize comScore research data for business & marketing strategy and media planning.

experiences.title: Logistics Specialist
experiences.description:
Metrica is a federal subcontractor. It manages several health initiative contracts in multiple African and Asian countries.
•	Managed health initiative project in Zambia and Unganda
•	Organized workflow and processed administrative duties to ensure continuing operations
•	Communicated and monitored subcontractors’ activities and spending to meet client’s expectation

experiences.title: Contracts Intern
experiences.description:
•	Contributed to streamline monthly reporting streamlined process
•	Re-organized company’s database, centralizing the data into a sharable database that improved searchability and access
•	Audited financial inconsistencies and corrected the records
•	Processed Purchasing Orders from Government and drafted Task Orders for Project Managers/Sub-contractors.

experiences.title: Entrepreneur in Residence/Operations Manager
experiences.description:
Easy Taxi was a Rocket Internet backed venture. It pioneered ride-hailing services in Vietnam. It connected the fragmented taxi drivers to provide a standardized and high-quality service to customers in Ho Chi Minh city and Hanoi.

•	Researched the taxi market and developed strategies to achieve key KPIs
•	Improved operational processes to acquire, onboard and manage taxi drivers
•	Set up data structure to monitor key performances for strategy pivots and improvements
•	Led operations to scale growth

experiences.title: Associate Research Analyst
experiences.description:
Deltek is a software and solutions company with locations across multiple countries. It has many different products, among them is GovWin IQ. GovWin IQ is a government contracting intelligence platform that enables businesses to manage public sector opportunities, pursue deals faster, and plan strategically to get ahead of the competition

•	Evaluated RFPs/RFQs/RFIs to find match opportunities for clients
•	Analyzed spending reports across agencies to forecast out the trends and advise clients on their acquisition strategy
•	Engaged with government officials and commercial clients to see out opportunities and provide research support
•	Represented Deltek at industry events and conferences to report on public policy and market trends
•	Presented Deltek’s products to prospective client’s executives
